reference.title: euca-download-bundle
reference.shortdesc: Download the specified bundles from Walrus storage.

row.entry: Name of the bucket where the bundle is located.
The manifest filename (without the path). We recommend you specify either the manifest (option -m), or the filename prefix (option -p).
The filename prefix for the bundled EMI files

The directory where the downloaded bundle is saved. This directory must exist.
Default: /tmp

section.title: Output
section.p: Eucalyptus returns status messages that indicate the various stages of the download process.

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: euca-download-bundle -b mah-bukkit -m myimage.img.manifest.xml Downloading myimage.img.manifest.xml Downloading myimage.img.part.00 Downloading myimage.img.part.01 Downloading myimage.img.part.02 Downloading myimage.img.part.03
